knimeNode.name: Inject Variables (Data)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Merges Variables from one connection into the data connection. The data is simply handed through.

fullDescription.intro: This node merges Variables from one connection into the data connection. The data is simply handed through.

ports.inPort: Port object being passed on to output port.
ports.outPort: The unaltered input table (first input port), whereby the connection carries the variables as defined in second input port.
